Articles.Content:
Hello ksp community,

I've had my eyes on ksp for some time, and recently I got the demo. I swore that I would not create an account here or get the full game until I successfully landed on the mun and made it back.

wut- no spoilers?

Several bucks down the whole and a couple days later, here I am.

Also, I'm a forum veteran. I've been on multiple forums, and know my way around things VERY well, so don't expect me to ask how to put up a pic.

(Actually, I will ask how to post youtube vids directly embedded into the post, but still)

I hope I get to know a lot of you guys!
Nice job! And welcome to the forums!
Congratulations on going to the mun and back!
Welcome and congrats on making it there and back.
